title: Quick connect does not save history
author: agostonl119
body_snippet: The Quick Connect toolbar not saving host history.

iterations.description: The Quick Connect history is not being persisted across application sessions, indicating a fault in the saving or loading mechanism.

notes:
AI triage (gemini): The Quick Connect history is not being persisted across application sessions, indicating a fault in the saving or loading mechanism.
Approach: Investigate `SettingsPath` resolution, verify `quickConnectToolStrip` and its `QuickConnectComboBox` are not null during `SaveSettings` invocation, and debug `QuickConnectComboBox.GetHistoryItems()`. Add logging to both saving and loading functions to trace the process, check file system for `quickConnectHistory.xml` content, and confirm file permissions.
